author: Fearless & Far
description:
Welcome to the raw and electrifying world of Dambe, a brutal West African martial art where warriors clash in a no-holds-barred battle of fists, pride, and tradition. With one arm wrapped for striking and the other for defense, these fighters channel centuries of Hausa warrior spirit in a showdown unlike anything you’ve seen. No gloves. No ropes. Just grit, rhythm, and blood.

Join our Expeditions & Adventure Retreats
